code: export const ADD_CART_ITEM="@@cart/cartItemAdded";export const REMOVE_CART_ITEM="@@cart/cartItemRemoved";export const addCartItem=sku=>{return async dispatch=>{dispatch({type:ADD_CART_ITEM,payload:{sku}});};};export const removeCartItem=(sku,quantity)=>{return async dispatch=>dispatch({type:REMOVE_CART_ITEM,payload:{sku:sku,quantity:quantity}});};
